description: This Python script is a command-line interface (CLI) for a universal project initializer. It parses arguments, creates project configurations, retrieves template initialization info, and outputs JSON summaries. It supports various project types and demonstrates detailed handling of parameters, paths, and project templates.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a string of comma-separated key=value pairs into a dictionary with appropriately typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig instance from command-line arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on the provided base path.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts TemplateInitInfo object into a dictionary, making paths absolute for init_files.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs a JSON-formatted result indicating success or failure with associated messages and data.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main function that sets up argument parsing, initializes project templates, displays information, and executes project initialization, returning JSON output.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
